name: Dr. S. Kumar
content:
• Former Chancellor of Sri Devaraj Urs Academy of Higher Education & Research, Kolar served 5 years.
  • Head Academics & Content Development, Educational Rating & Assessment Foundation of India since 8 year
  • Executive Secretary COMED K (Consortium of Medical. Engineering & Dental Colleges) since 16 years.
  • Secretary CODEUNIK (Consortium of deemed Universities in Karnataka) since 7 years.
  • Served as President - Medical Education at Gokula Education Foundation - Health Sciences, the promoters of M.S. Ramaiah group for 3 years after serving as Principal & Dean at M.S. Ramaiah Medical College and Hospitals for 7 years. Relieved from the MSR group after 34 years’ experience in Medical Education.
  • Trustee of ‘SPANDANA’ resource centre for differently-abled children in rural areas serving 36 villages, since 15 years.
  • Total 3 years of Research experience with Indian Council of Medical Research.
  • Received ‘Award for Excellence in Service to Community in 2005 -2006 from Rotary Bangalore North west & Lions Club (North).
  • Awarded “Outstanding Alumni Award from Bangalore Medical College in 2016.

name: Mr. Y. Srinivasa Rao
content:
Successfully built the companies, Created and managed efficient Supply chain activities, Project management, R&D and Technical functions effectively integrated to deliver superior results, successfully deployed: Kaizen, TPM, Lean practices, Safety culture, BPR, Proficient and Dexterity in IR/HR initiatives

  • Strategized to deter militant R situation that led to 18 months strike without loss of production. Initiated process to make workers and Management work together on vital issues.
  • Designed and implemented a novel and effective GET/DET scheme to augment needs of growing company.

International working / Exposure:

  • Worked in Corning, Inc USA for more than 1.5 years.
  • Worked with Samsung Corning, S. Korea.
  • Extensively travelled to Asia, Europe and North America

Have deep understanding various states of India as he worked in all parts of India.

name: Dr. K. N. Chidambara Murthy
qualfication: M. Pharma, D R&D, PhD, MAMS
content:
• Senior Research Scientist with more than 2 decades of research experience.
  • Master in Pharmacy from Government Pharmacy College, Bengaluru;
  • PhD in Biotechnology from University of Mysore CSIR-CFTRI.
  • Postdoctoral and advanced molecular and nutrition research experience from Texas A&M University, USA
  • Worked at one of the well known private medical college for 9 years as research scientist
  • Currently associated with well known diagnostic industry in India.

name: Dr. Sharath Kote G. S
content:
• MBBS and MD with specialization in Internal Medicine
  • Won Gold Medal in National Board of Examinations in Gastroenterology, 2017
  • More than 14 years of experience in Department of Medicine and Gastroenterology
  • Taught UG and PG students in various institutions in Karnataka

name: Dr. Nisarg Aravindan
qualfication: Junior Resident,Department of Community and Family Medicine, AIIMS Rishikesh
content:
• Doctor specialising in Community and Family Medicine at AIIMS Rishikesh
  • Completed Management program for medical professionals at IIM, Ahmedabad
  • Internship program at NITI Aayog, Public Policy Think Tank, Government of India
  • Many research programs to his name, having currently received an MD thesis grant for his thesis from ICMR.
  • Currently with Unnathi Healing Foundation as team leader for the initiative 'Build India Movement' Unnathi Wellness LLP as Partner

name: Dr. Bharathi Anjanappa
content:
• Holds MBBS, DGO, MS
  • Specialists in Obstetrics and Gynaecology in ESICMC PGIMSSR, Bengaluru
  • Member of Fogsi Quiz Committee South Zone 2015, Reviewer for JCDR journal
  • Member of Indian association for adolescent health
  • Permanent member of BSOG, FOGSI and ICOG
  • Faculty in AICOG 2016.
  • Awarded ICOG fellowship in 2016
  • Published over 14 research papers in National & International journals (JCDR, SAFOG, BJOG, IJRCOG), Conferences (RCOG-2014, AICOG 2015, 2020)
